tests.query:
-- max_block_size to avoid randomization
SELECT * FROM generateRandom('i Array(Int8)', 1, 1, 1048577) LIMIT 65536 SETTINGS max_memory_usage='1Gi', max_block_size=65505, log_queries=1;
tests.name: 02400_memory_accounting_on_error.sql

tests.query: SELECT * FROM system.query_log WHERE event_date >= yesterday() AND current_database = currentDatabase() AND memory_usage > 100e6 FORMAT JSONEachRow;
tests.name: 02400_memory_accounting_on_error.sql
